a.n: The Morgenland Festival: Needless to Say

p.k: Featuring graduate of the Boston Conservatory and vocalist Dima Oshno, both songs "Dream" and "Mugam" are played by the All Star Band and express a range of moods that vary from peaceful quietude to outbursts of energy.
p.d: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. Enjoy the musical wealth of the All Star Band in this episode of Morgenland Festival. Featuring graduate of the Boston Conservatory and vocalist Dima Oshno, both songs "Dream" and "Mugam" are played by the All Star Band and express a range of moods that vary from peaceful quietude to outbursts of energy.
